details.text: The property reasonCode must be a JSON Array, not an Object (at Encounter)

The value provided ('completed') was not found in the value set 'EncounterStatus' (http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/encounter-status|4.0.1), and a code is required from this value set  (error message = The System URI could not be determined for the code 'completed' in the ValueSet 'http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/encounter-status|4.0.1'; The provided code '#completed' was not found in the value set 'http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/encounter-status|4.0.1')
